tool.name: Voronoi
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayInputPoints False output_data_Result $output_data_Result name Voronoi InputPoints $InputPoints prefer $prefer response $response outputType_Result $OutputSection_Result.outputType_Result transmissionMode_Result $OutputSection_Result.transmissionMode_Result

param.name: InputPoints
param.label: Data points
param.help: The set of data points. The following data types are allowed in the txt file: xml

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_Result
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_Result
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

tool.help: Computes the edges of Voronoi diagram for a set of data points.
